games.summary: Luka Doncic had a triple-double by halftime and finished with 37 points, 13 assists and 11 rebounds in the Los Angeles Lakers ' 142-111 rout of the Washington Wizards on Friday night. Malaki Branham scored 17 points for the Wizards, who were trying for their first three-game winning streak of the season but were on the second night of a back-to-back.
blurbs: ⬆️ Anthony Gill (WSH) played 17 min (season avg: 5). 9 pts, 10 reb, 0 ast.
⬆️ Malaki Branham (WSH) played 22 min (season avg: 10). 17 pts, 1 reb, 0 ast.
⬆️ Jamir Watkins (WSH) played 35 min (season avg: 16). 8 pts, 6 reb, 2 ast.
⬆️ Will Riley (WSH) played 25 min (season avg: 14). 13 pts, 2 reb, 5 ast.

games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla. Brandon Ingram scored 35 points for the Raptors, who led by as many as 14 points late in the third quarter and were seeking their fifth straight road win.
blurbs: ⬆️ Collin Murray-Boyles (TOR) played 33 min (season avg: 22). 12 pts, 6 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: Payton Pritchard scored 29 points, Baylor Scheierman had 16 and the Boston Celtics rolled to a 112-93 win over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night. Zach LaVine scored 17 points for Sacramento, which has lost eight in a row and played on the second night of a back-to-back Nique Clifford added 15 points.
blurbs: 📋 Baylor Scheierman (BOS) made just his 4th start this season. 16 pts, 5 reb.
⬆️ Maxime Raynaud (SAC) played 36 min (season avg: 23). 14 pts, 14 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Nique Clifford (SAC) played 34 min (season avg: 19). 15 pts, 3 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Jalen Brunson scored 26 points and OG Anunoby added 24 points as the New York Knicks extended their winning streak to five games with a 127-97 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday night. Seven Knicks players scored in double figures, and New York led comfortably for much of the game after posting a 34-12 run in the first half and leading by 24 points.
blurbs: ⬆️ Mohamed Diawara (NY) played 17 min (season avg: 5). 10 pts, 3 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: Saddiq Bey and Derik Queen each had 22 points, Zion Williamson added 21 and the New Orleans Pelicans beat the Memphis Grizzlies 114-106 on Friday night. Williamson had his fourth consecutive game with 20-plus points.

Dillon Brooks scored 27 points and the Phoenix Suns beat Cleveland 126-113 on Friday night to sweep a back-to-back and end the Cavaliers' winning streak at a season-best five games. On Thursday night against Detroit, the Suns gave out “Dillon the Villain” T-shirts before Brooks scored a career-high 40 points in a 114-96 victory.
blurbs: ⬆️ Thomas Bryant (CLE) played 25 min (season avg: 9). 9 pts, 6 reb, 6 ast.

games.summary: Nikola Jokic had 31 points and 12 rebounds in his first game in a month, Tim Hardaway Jr . Jokic scored 11 points over a stretch of 3:47 in the fourth quarter that extended Denver’s lead from five to 16.

Egor Demin set an NBA rookie record by making a 3-pointer in his 34th straight game and finished with 25 points and 10 rebounds to help the Brooklyn Nets snap a seven-game losing streak with a 109-99 victory over the Utah Jazz on Friday night. Brooklyn outscored the Jazz 20-2 in second-chance points.
blurbs: ⬆️ Cody Williams (UTAH) played 28 min (season avg: 18). 6 pts, 2 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Nolan Traore (BKN) made just his 2nd start this season. 7 pts, 2 reb.

games.summary: Cade Cunningham had 29 points and 11 assists and the Detroit Pistons jumped to a big lead early before holding off the Golden State Warriors for a 131-124 win Friday night. Stephen Curry scored 23 points for his fourth straight 20-point performance before exiting with right knee soreness.
blurbs: 📋 Al Horford (GS) made just his 4th start this season. 13 pts, 7 reb.
⬆️ Gui Santos (GS) played 25 min (season avg: 13). 16 pts, 1 reb, 1 ast.
